Paris.name: 1er Arrondissement
Paris.description: Historic heart with Louvre, Palais Royal gardens, and Tuileries

Paris.name: 2e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Historic stock exchange district with covered passages Galerie Vivienne

Paris.name: 3e Arrondissement (Le Marais)
Paris.description: Historic Jewish quarter with medieval streets, LGBTQ+ friendly, Place des Vosges

Paris.name: 4e Arrondissement (Le Marais)
Paris.description: Oldest area with Notre-Dame, Île Saint-Louis, gay bars, Hôtel de Ville

Paris.name: 5e Arrondissement (Latin Quarter)
Paris.description: Student area with Sorbonne, Panthéon, Roman ruins, Jardin des Plantes

Paris.name: 6e Arrondissement (Saint-Germain)
Paris.description: Literary history with chic boutiques, Café de Flore, Luxembourg Gardens

Paris.name: 7e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Elegant district with Eiffel Tower, Rue Cler market, Musée d'Orsay

Paris.name: 8e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Champs-Élysées luxury shopping, Parc Monceau, Petit Palais

Paris.name: 9e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Opéra and Grands Boulevards, Palais Garnier, Galeries Lafayette rooftop

Paris.name: 10e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Canal Saint-Martin hipster scene with locks and trendy cafés

Paris.name: 11e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Trendy nightlife and food scene, Oberkampf bars, Belleville border

Paris.name: 12e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Bercy and Bois de Vincennes, Coulée verte, Marché d'Aligre

Paris.name: 13e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Chinatown and modern architecture, Bibliothèque François Mitterrand

Paris.name: 14e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Montparnasse and catacombs, Denfert-Rochereau, Fondation Cartier

Paris.name: 15e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Family-friendly residential area, Parc André Citroën, Île aux Cygnes

Paris.name: 16e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Upscale with Trocadéro views, Musée Marmottan, Boileau village

Paris.name: 17e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Quiet Batignolles village vibe, Square des Batignolles, Rue de Lévis market

Paris.name: 18e Arrondissement (Montmartre)
Paris.description: Artist hill with village atmosphere, Sacré-Cœur, Place du Tertre

Paris.name: 19e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Belleville and Parc des Buttes-Chaumont, Bassin de la Villette

Paris.name: 20e Arrondissement
Paris.description: Père Lachaise Cemetery and local authentic vibe, Rue de Bagnolet

Marseille.name: Le Panier
Marseille.description: Old town's historic fishing village with colorful buildings

Marseille.name: Vieux-Port
Marseille.description: Picturesque harbor with fish restaurants and boat tours

Marseille.name: Corniche
Marseille.description: Coastal road with stunning Mediterranean views and beaches

Marseille.name: Prado
Marseille.description: Beach area with wide sandy shores and palm-lined promenades

Marseille.name: Noailles
Marseille.description: Bustling market district with North African influences

Marseille.name: Endoume
Marseille.description: Charming fishermen's quarter near the old port

Lyon.name: Vieux Lyon
Lyon.description: Renaissance old town with traboules and silk workshops

Lyon.name: Fourvière
Lyon.description: Hilltop area with the basilica and Roman amphitheater

Lyon.name: Presqu'île
Lyon.description: Peninsula between two rivers with nightlife and shopping

Lyon.name: Croix-Rousse
Lyon.description: Former silk-weavers' district with artistic heritage

Lyon.name: Guillotière
Lyon.description: Multicultural area with diverse food and street art

Nice.name: Vieux Nice
Nice.description: Colorful old town with Italian influences and flower market

Nice.name: Promenade des Anglais
Nice.description: Famous seaside walkway with beaches and Art Deco hotels

Nice.name: Cimiez
Nice.description: Upscale residential area with Roman ruins and museums

Nice.name: Port
Nice.description: Lively harbor area with yachts, restaurants, and nightlife

Bordeaux.name: Vieux Bordeaux
Bordeaux.description: Historic district with 18th-century architecture and wine bars

Bordeaux.name: Chartrons
Bordeaux.description: Trendy neighborhood with wine merchant houses and antiques

Bordeaux.name: Saint-Pierre
Bordeaux.description: Central area with elegant squares and designer boutiques

Bordeaux.name: Bassins à Flot
Bordeaux.description: Redeveloped port area with contemporary architecture
